data.persona: I am a peasant's child. I find it hard to obtain food. I have very little fat on me.
data.description:
You are in the Meadow.
This meadow is composed of green, luscious, rolling hills. Flowers dot the expanse. In the evening, one may stand from the hills of this meadow and see the sun set beneath the horizon off in the distance.
There's a hill and a flower here.
The peasant and the deer are here.

You are carrying an crystal ball, and wearing a shoe and a belt.
data.goal: give a crystal ball to deer

            "desc": "I am a poor humble peasant.  I have spent my whole life toiling from dawn to dusk to till the land of my lord.  My back aches and my knees have little bend left in them. data.short_motivation: I want to give the crystal ball to the deer so the deer can use it to do magic.
data.mid_motivation: I want the deer to do the crystal magic which will allow her to turn back into her human form.
data.long_motivation: The deer is a great sorceress trapped in the animal's body, and if I help free her, she will adopt me and take me with her on her travels.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: steal Crystal Ball from Warlock's Cottage
